text: People don't have these tidy little redemption arcs in reality the way they do in movies.
author: Diablo Cody

text: I'm not an especially highbrow person, but I have always loved small, quirky, edgy movies.
author: Diablo Cody

text: I don't know why, but I've always been a sucker for roller coasters in movies.
author: Diablo Cody

text: Oh, I adored Mickey Mouse when I was a child. He was the emblem of happiness and funniness. You went to the movies then, you saw two movies and a short. When Mickey Mouse came on the screen and there was his big head, my sister said she had to hold onto me. I went berserk.
author: Maurice Sendak

text: Going to the movies was a big event in my youth. My father would be the initiator - he'd have me put on a jacket to see a film.
author: Ralph Fiennes
